name: iMe Messenger
description: Fast, Smart, Powerful, Private, Cloud-based, Secure.  iMe Messenger is an unofficial Telegram API based client.  User authorization, data transferring and storing are conducted through official clients servers.  Privacy and security are fully guaranteed by the official client.  iMe Messenger uses messengers environment for further functions developing and neurobots (chat assistants) training.  Users install iMe Messenger to use new features and all advantages of Artificial Intelligence (Ai) without losing their social circle and the usual quality of the advanced messenger.  iMe Messenger helps users sort chats by folders with additional settings (Tabs from the bottom; Disable the All chats tab; Change the FAB buttons for each folder, etc.).  Convenient Collections give users the ability to quickly find and subscribe to channels, groups and bots of interest on various topics.   Neurobots inside chats save time and make communication more interesting.  Additional features:  - Chats grouping in folders; - Cloud with sorting messages by type; - Translator of incoming and outgoing messages inside chats; - Forwarding a message without quoting; - Multi-panel in chats, for quick access to in-depth buttons; - Neurobots-assistants providing users with phrases and gifs as responses; - Neurobots market with different categories of assistants; - Channel/Group/Bot Collections; - Wallet and internal coins, as a universal means of payment and monetization in the application;  Character neurobots offer you ready phrases and gifs in their styles and manners so you can answer a message in a chat. If the incoming message isnt suitable for a certain neurobot, it simply wont offer you its variant of a response.  The more different neurobots you add to your chats, the more unique responses to the greater number of messages they will be able to offer. A neurobot reacts to the last incoming message, and if this message corresponds to its subject, the neurobot is activated.   You can also use the Reply function for a previous incoming message in order to apply your neurobot to the phrase.  Write to our support service if you have any requests, questions or complaints: support@imem.app  For cooperation: info@imem.app  Write in the messenger: https://t.me/iMeMessenger
